title: 4.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Write a program to create a List that contains numbers from 0 to 20. Create two empty Lists: odd_numbers and even_numbers. Using the for loop store odd numbers in odd_numbers and even numbers in the even_numbers.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

input = 1
